main event: A civilian reported seeing a strange, orange-red object in level flight, perhaps rising from 10-30 degrees elevation, in Townsend, Massachusetts on December 2, 1952 around 4:35 pm.
interesting points: The object was observed for 3-5 minutes.
The type of observation was a ground visual.
The conclusion was that the object was an astronomical meteor, despite its unusual characteristics.
The report is part of Project 10073, which was likely related to the broader Project Blue Book UFO investigation.
